headline: Fortune And ServiceNow Reveal the 2025 Fortune AIQ 50 List, Sponsored by ServiceNow
summary: Today, Fortune and ServiceNow unveil the inaugural FortuneAIQ 50 List, a definitive ranking of Fortune 500 companies that are generating significant and measurable impact with artificial intelligence. Together, these companies' strategies form an essential roadmap for leaders steering organizations through today's era of AI-driven transformation. ServiceNow's 2025 Enterprise AI Maturity Index research served as the foundation for the methodology behind the Fortune AIQ 50 List.

headline: Visa bets on stablecoins to speed up cross-border payments
summary: (Reuters) -Visa said on Tuesday it will start testing a new way for businesses to fund international payments by allowing them to use stablecoins instead of pre-depositing cash in local accounts.  The move signals growing acceptance of these digital tokens among major businesses, who have been emboldened by the United States passing the Genius Act, a law that set clear rules for stablecoin issuers.  The pilot initiative will allow banks, remittance firms and other financial institutions to pre-fund accounts with stablecoins instead of traditional currencies.
